CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 共同；一起；在一起；到一起；协同；合作地；同时；一齐；一致；连续地；不间断地；接连地；协调地；一致地；亲密地；紧密地
沉稳的；自信而有条理的；（两人）结婚的

synonym.mean: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共
新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 相聚，家庭聚会；团结精神；归属感

word_group.brief_definition: 放在一起；放到一起；放一起
组装到一起；拼凑成；装配起来
同…一起, 和, 连同, 加之
一起工作；共同工作；共同努力
将…连在一起；缀合；一起加入

bilingual.target: 我很享受我们在一起的时光。
他们享受在一起的时光。
哪些颜色搭配在一起好看？
所有家庭成员聚在一起。
把冰淇淋的部分粘在一起。
我永远不会忘记我们在一起的时光。

bilingual.source: My family are going to get together.

list.abstract: together，英文单词，副词、形容词，作副词时意为“一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共”，作形容词时意为“新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的”。
《Together》是中国台湾女子组合S.H.E的第四张专辑，是一张新歌加精选专辑，于2001年1月23日由华研国际发行，收录四首新歌《Always On My Mind》、《白色恋歌》、《天使在唱歌》和《我和幸福有约定》，及《恋人未满》、《Remember》、《热带雨林”》、《美丽新世界》等12首代表曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe you two should live together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两个应该住在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: So are he and your dad still together?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们还在一起吗？

yingyinNormal.en: 25J and K, any chance those aren't together?
yingyinNormal.zh: 25J跟K 会不会刚好不在一起？

yingyinNormal.en: You two live here together? Too many questions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们俩现在住在一起么？你问题太多了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Wait, mom. Mom. How are you and dad together?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，等下，妈妈，你和爸爸怎么在一起？

yingyinNormal.en: Did you break up with her? No, we're still together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你跟她分手了？不，我们还在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: He is the gooey, sticky stuff that holds us together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是死缠烂打的橡皮糖，把我们都黏在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe they've been together for three years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真不能相信他们在一起3年了。

yingyinNormal.en: Dan said they would phone when they were all together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丹说等他们和艾瑞克在一起，他会打个电话回来的。

yingyinNormal.en: Monica. We lived together for years. I've seen you naked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们住在一起那么多年，我看过你没穿衣服

yingyinNormal.en: When we're all having fun together, we're already winners.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我们在一起享受这个过程的时候，我们就已经是赢家了。

yingyinNormal.en: Put your hands together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把两只手放在一起吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so Mary and Beverly can't be together. Alfred and Beverly can't be together. Leonard and I can't be together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛丽和贝弗莉不能待在一起，阿尔弗瑞德和贝弗莉不能待在一起，莱纳德和我不能待在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: And they live together and shower together and have naked pillow fights?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她们住在一起，一同沐浴，还裸体枕头大战。

yingyinNormal.en: And you know what they say the family that plays together stays together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道他们说了什么，一大家人在一起，享受天伦之乐。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her friends love singing together in harmony. All the countries of the world love singing together in harmony.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和朋友们喜欢在一起和谐的歌唱。全世界的国家都喜欢在一起和谐的歌唱。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it is when you put it together with that one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把它跟那个连在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Our situation, you know, what we mean to each other. And I mean we're having this baby together, and we live together. Isn't that weird?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的情况，我们对彼此的意义，我是说我们要一起抚养孩子，我们要住在一起，那…那不是很奇怪吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh this two pieces fit together. Fixing the teapot is a bit like doing the jigsaw puzzle. Well done Peppa. Now glue these pieces together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，这两块是相邻的。修茶壶有点像玩七巧板。做得好，佩奇。现在把他们粘在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh this two pieces fit together. Fixing the teapot is a bit like doing the jigsaw puzzle. Well done Peppa. Now glue these pieces together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，这两块是相邻的。修茶壶有点像玩七巧板。做得好，佩奇。现在把他们粘在一起。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 放在一起；放到一起；放一起

sense_info_list.en: with or near to someone or something else; with each other

examination_example.sentence: Guilt, in other words, can help hold a cooperative species <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，内疚感可以帮助一个有合作力的物种团结在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Learning why they disagree with us and learning to talk and work <highlight>together</highlight> with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解他们为什么不同意我们的观点，并学习与他们交谈和合作。

examination_example.sentence: We reason <highlight>together</highlight>, challenge, revise, and complete each other's reasoning and each other's conceptions of reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一起推理，挑战、修正和完成彼此的推理和彼此的理性概念。

sense_info_list.en: in a close relationship, for example a marriage

examination_example.sentence: Dr. Gottman really wants to assess whether a couple will stay <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Gottman博士真的想评估一对夫妇是否会在一起。

sense_info_list.en: at the same time
confident, organized, and able to deal with problems in a calm and skillful way
in or into agreement
without interruption
so that two or more things touch or are joined to or combined with each other

word_usage.usage:
together with意思是“和···”，谓语动词和主语保持一致，示例：
A teacher together with five students was in the classroom then.（谓语was和主语a teacher保持一致）
当时有一个老师和五个学生在教室里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 关系密切; 有婚姻关系

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 组装到一起；拼凑成；装配起来

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adv. 在一起；一块儿；共同；同时；一齐；不间断地；接连地；靠在一起；一致地；合作地

sense_info_list.en: with or near to someone or something else; with each other

examination_example.sentence: In towns, they live crowded <highlight>together</highlight> in tiny houses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在城镇里，他们一起挤在小房子里。

examination_example.sentence: While these two desires often work well <highlight>together</highlight>, they occasionally come into conflict.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这两种愿望经常可以很好地协同配合，但它们偶尔会发生冲突。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Together</highlight>, the value of these metals is estimated to be about S52 billion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些金属估计价值520亿美元左右。

sense_info_list.en: so that two or more things touch or are joined to or combined with each other

examination_example.sentence: Schools cannot be expected to bring <highlight>together</highlight> communities single-handed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不能指望学校单凭一己之力把社会结合起来。

examination_example.sentence: She began a nationwide campaign to have a national holiday declared that would bring families <highlight>together</highlight> while celebrating the traditional festivals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她发起了一场全国性的运动，希望设立一个全国性的节日，让家人聚在一起庆祝传统节日。

sense_info_list.en: at the same time
in a close relationship, for example a marriage
sense_info_list.zh: 关系密切; 有婚姻关系

word_usage.usage:
together with表示“连同”，和with用法相同，置于句中时，谓语动词与前面的主语保持一致。
示例：I am together with you.
我同你在一起。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 关系密切; 有婚姻关系

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: with or near to someone or something else; with each other

examination_example.sentence: What's needed now is a marketplace platform specifically designed to bring freelancers and clients <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在需要的是一个专门用于将自由职业者和客户聚集起来的市场平台。

examination_example.sentence: In the classic marriage vow (誓约) , couples promise to stay <highlight>together</highlight> in sickness and in health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经典的婚姻誓约中，夫妻双方承诺无论疾病还是健康都不离不弃。

examination_example.sentence: Should you tell your friends, for instance, that they're being recorded while you all watch the big game <highlight>together</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你是否应该告诉你的朋友们，当你们一起观看大型比赛时，他们正在被记录下来？

sense_info_list.en: at the same time

examination_example.sentence: He damaged someone's car and wanted to get some money <highlight>together</highlight> to make up for the damage he'd caused.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他弄坏了别人的车，想凑点钱来弥补他造成的损失。

examination_example.sentence: I would suggest that you let us first conduct a financial analysis of your company, <highlight>together</highlight> with an analysis of your competitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我建议你让我们先对贵司进行财务分析，同时对你的竞争对手进行分析。

sense_info_list.en: so that two or more things touch or are joined to or combined with each other
in a close relationship; for example a marriage
sense_info_list.zh: 关系密切; 有婚姻关系

word_usage.usage:
together with表示“连同”，和with用法相同，置于句中时，谓语动词与前面的主语保持一致。
示例：I am together with you.
我同你在一起。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 将...放在一起；装配；组建；拟定；设计制造

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: with or near to someone or something else; with each other

examination_example.sentence: When the light appeared, Rjukan residents gathered <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当光亮出现时，Rjukan居民聚集在一起。

examination_example.sentence: We both became absorbed in the simplicity of playing <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都沉浸在一起玩耍的简单的快乐之中。

examination_example.sentence: We will come <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会走到一起。

sense_info_list.en: at the same time

examination_example.sentence: They often get up early and water the vegetables <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们经常早起一起给蔬菜浇水。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 放在一起；放到一起；放一起
组装到一起；拼凑成；装配起来
将…连在一起；缀合；一起加入
一起工作；共同工作；共同努力

sense_info_list.en: with or near to someone or something else; with each other

examination_example.sentence: They have made a cleaner and more beautiful school all <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们一起建造了一所更干净、更漂亮的学校。

examination_example.sentence: She and I had great fun <highlight>together</highlight> last summer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年夏天，我和她在一起玩得很开心。

examination_example.sentence: As long as we pull <highlight>together</highlight>, we'll make it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要我们齐心协力，我们就能成功。

sense_info_list.en: so that two or more things touch or are joined to or combined with each other

examination_example.sentence: We tried many times, the heart were in too many broken bits to put back <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们试了很多次，但心脏已经碎得不能在拼好了。

examination_example.sentence: They take coloring, protein (蛋白质) and fats from these plants and mix them <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们从这些植物中提取色素、蛋白质和脂肪，并将它们混合在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Putting what I saw <highlight>together</highlight>, I was sure she was blind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 综合我所看到的，我确信她看不见。

sense_info_list.en: at the same time

examination_example.sentence: There were five scared baby cats crying <highlight>together</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有五只害怕同时又哭泣的小猫。

examination_example.sentence: Theatrical art forms in many other countries do not have singing, dancing and spoken parts <highlight>together</highlight> in one single drama.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多其他国家的戏剧艺术形式没有歌唱、舞蹈和旁白同时出现在一场戏剧中的。

examination_example.sentence: The adult cicada has two sets of wings which can shake <highlight>together</highlight> to produce a high, continuous sound when the weather is hot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成年蝉有两组翅膀，当天气炎热时，它们可以同时摇动产生高而连续的声音。

word_usage.usage:
together with表示“连同”，和with用法相同，置于句中时，谓语动词与前面的主语保持一致。
示例：I am together with you.
我同你在一起。
